name: USUD
description: The USUD UMBRA Sovereign US Dollar is a USD-pegged stablecoin designed specifically for the Umbra Blockchain. It aims to enhance the global financial system by offering a stable, digital dollar that facilitates seamless, secure, and efficient transactions. The project focuses on leveraging blockchain technology to make the US dollar more accessible and powerful on a global scale, positioning it as a leader in the next era of digital finance. USUD is fully backed by reserves, ensuring stability, and is integrated into the Umbra Blockchain to support various financial applications.
